function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate surveillance of multiple diseases, including rare ones, in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease outbreaks and spread due to lack of monitoring and early detection","Mitigation":"Implement a comprehensive and flexible surveillance system that can monitor multiple diseases in real-time, including rare diseases, and is cost-effective and scalable","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology, real-time monitoring systems, flexible surveillance techniques","People":"General population, public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers"},{"Description":"Insufficient environmental monitoring of potential hazards in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to environmental hazards and infectious agents, leading to adverse health outcomes","Mitigation":"Incorporate environmental monitoring into the surveillance system to identify and assess potential hazards in real-time","Technologies":"Water fingerprinting, environmental monitoring technologies","People":"General population, public health authorities, environmental agencies","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive data collection on the emergence and re-emergence of diseases, and threat of drug-resistant pathogens","Impact":"Limited ability to detect and respond to emerging disease threats and drug-resistant pathogens, potentially leading to widespread outbreaks","Mitigation":"Develop a surveillance system with comprehensive data collection on emerging diseases, re-emerging diseases, and drug-resistant pathogens, with real-time monitoring capabilities","Technologies":"Data collection systems, real-time monitoring technologies","People":"Public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers"}]}
